description:
Azkar App is your daily companion for enhancing spirituality and facilitating Islamic practices. It provides a comprehensive collection of authentic Athkar (remembrances) and supplications from the Qur’an and Sunnah, along with innovative features designed to meet the needs of Muslims in their daily lives.

Join millions of users and experience a complete spiritual journey with Azkar App, crafted to serve every Muslim.

Key Features
- Morning & Evening Athkar, Sleep & Wake-up Athkar, Prayer Athkar, and more: A modern and user-friendly interface with an audio player and repetition counter.
- My Athkar Section: Create and customize your own Athkar according to your needs.
- Qur’an (Reading, Tafsir, and Audio): Enjoy an eye-friendly reading experience with font and color customization, translations in multiple languages, and easy-to-understand Tafsir. You can also listen or download recitations by your favorite reciter.
- Khatmah: Set a Qur’an completion plan with daily reading reminders.
- Prayer Times, Qibla Direction, and Hijri Calendar: View the Islamic calendar, accurate prayer times, and Qibla direction, with a monthly prayer calendar that can be shared.
- Adhan & Full Adhan Alerts: Choose from a variety of Adhan voices with pre-Adhan reminders.
- Reminders Section: Create reminders for specific Athkar, supplications, or important events with customizable sound and repetition options.
- Daily Content Updates: Get Dua of the Day, Ayah of the Day, and Video of the Day with valuable tips and inspiring stories.
- Various Azkar: A variety of supplications with customizable backgrounds, ready for sharing.
- Ramadan Section: Essential Ramadan features including Prayer & Fasting Tracker, Daily Duas, Zakat Calculator, and more.
- Daily Quranic Benefits: Daily insights into Qur’anic verses for contemplation.
- Worship Trackers: Tools to track Athkar, fasting, and prayers, helping you stay consistent and improve commitment.
- Tasbih Counter: Perform electronic Dhikr with an easy-to-use digital Tasbih.
- Ruqyah (Islamic Healing): Authentic Ruqyah texts from the Qur’an and Sunnah, with an audio listening option.
- Prophet Muhammad’s (PBUH) Biography in Videos: Engaging video content about the life of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).
- 99 Names of Allah.
- Surah Al-Kahf Reminder for Fridays.
- Hajj & Umrah Guide: Step-by-step instructions for performing Hajj and Umrah.
- Islamic & Ramadan WhatsApp Stickers: Updated Islamic and Ramadan sticker packs with easy export to WhatsApp.
- Istighfar (Forgiveness) Alerts: Get reminders for seeking forgiveness and making Dhikr at customizable intervals (e.g., every 10 minutes or once a day).
- Qiyam-ul-Layl (Night Prayer) Alerts.
- Live Activities & Widgets: Quick access to features like prayer times, Hijri date, various azkar, Khatmah, prayer tracker, fasting tracker, and more from the home screen and lock screen.
- Professional & Customizable Design: Choose your favorite background, and enable dark mode for a better visual experience.
- …and many more great features you’ll love!

Why Azkar App?
Azkar App is a comprehensive Islamic tool, combining authenticity with modern technology to fulfill your spiritual and daily needs.

Take this opportunity to increase your daily rewards and strengthen your connection with Allah. Download Azkar App now and embark on an uninterrupted spiritual journey filled with Dhikr and supplication.


Privacy Policy:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/privacy.html

Terms of Use:
https://hamzaaa.com/azkar/terms-of-use.html

نسخة شاملة ومطورة من المكتبة الصوتية للقرآن الكريم (موقع وتطبيق MP3 Quran) مخصص للهواتف الذكية لقراءة القرآن الكريم والاستماع إلى تلاواته من مصحف ورش .  يُعد هذا التطبيق مكتبة صوتية متكاملة للاستماع إلى تلاوات القرآن الكريم بترتيل مئات من مشاهير وأعلام القُراء في العالم الإسلامي. ويُقدم ضمن تصميمات أنيقة في 4 ألوان مختلفة، منهم اثنان لوضع القراءة الليلية، ويتيح الاطلاع على المختصر في تفسير القرآن الكريم.

التطبيق يتمتع بأغلب مزايا"المصحف الإلكتروني"... حيث واجهة استخدام سهلة، إمكانية قراءة المصحف وتقليب صفحاته بإحدى خاصيتي الإزاحة والتقليب واختيار عدم إغلاق الشاشة أثناء القراءة، إمكانيات بحث سريعة بالكلمات، الاطلاع على التفسير، وإضافة ملاحظاتك على الآيات أثناء القراءة أو الاستماع، مع خاصية الاستماع لقدر معين من السورة وترديد المقطع بعدد مرات محددة، ليعين على المراجعة وتثبيت الحفظ.
  إمكانيات وخيارات التطبيق:
قراءة القرآن الكريم من مصحف رواية ورش.
الاستماع إلى الآية أو الآيات المختارة بصوت قارئك المفضل من بين مئات من مشاهير وأعلام القُراء .
الاستماع لقدر معين من السورة وترديد المقطع بعدد مرات محددة
فهرس بأسماء السور والأجزاء، لسهولة وسرعة الوصول للجزء المطلوب .
بحث فائق السرعة بالكلمات للوصول إلى أي آية أو كلمة بسهولة.
اختيار عدد من الآيات في "المفضلة" لسرعة العودة إليها.
فواصل لتعيين موضع الوقف عن الانتهاء من القراءة، لسهولة العودة لمتابعة وردك اليومي.
عرض تفسير مُيسّر للآيات من كتاب "المختصر في تفسير القرآن الكريم"، بجوار كل آية، مع إمكانية نسخه ومشاركته مع الآخرين.
خيارات الآيات: تدوين الملاحظات والخواطر للمساعدة على التدبُّر أثناء القراءة والاستماع أو الاطلاع على التفسير، إمكانية نسخ الآية ومشاركتها مع الآخرين.
ترجمة إنجليزية لمعاني القرآن من نسخة صحيح إنترناشيونال "saheeh International"
متوفر بواجهة استخدام سلسة باللغتين العربية والإنجليزية.
  تطبيق "تلاوة" من تطوير فريق عمل "سمارتك لتقنية المعلومات Smartech IT Solutions" بماليزيا http://smartech.online/  يسعدنا استقبال استفساراتكم ومقترحاتكم للتطوير عبر البريد الإلكتروني: info@smartech.online

Translate between up to 249 languages. Feature support varies by language:
• Text: Translate between languages by typing
• Offline: Translate with no Internet connection
• Instant camera translation: Translate text in images instantly by just pointing your camera
• Photos: Translate text in taken or imported photos
• Dictation: Translate spoken words and phrases
• Conversations: Translate bilingual conversations on the fly
• Transcribe: Continuously translate someone speaking a different language in near real-time
• Handwriting: Draw text characters instead of typing
• Phrasebook: Star and save translated words and phrases for future reference

Permissions notice:
• Microphone for speech translation
• Camera for translating text via the camera
• Photos for importing photos from your library

يمكنك نقل كل محتوى أذكاري اي جهاز ثاني أو ارساله إلى احد اقربائك أو اصدقائك.

اذا استخدمت نسخة من تطبيق أذكار في جهاز ثاني يمكنك مشاهدة نفس محتويات اذكاري والمفضلة والعداد.  
يمكنك استلام تنبيهات لكل قسم في أذكاري

---   النسخة الحصرية   ---

تطبيق أذكاري صُمم ليساعدك على ان لا تنسى ذكر الله ابداً!


تطبيق اذكاري صمم ليساعد على جعل الذكر عادة باذن الله

يمكنك الذكر اثناء تصفح الانترنت او اي برنامج تواصل اجتماعي مثل فيس بوك، تويتر، او اينستاغرام
يمكنك اظهار الأذكار اثناء المحادثة مع الاصدقاء على واتس اب، لاين، ڤايبر، فيس بوك، تانغو او اي تطبيق محادثة فقط بانزال مركز الاشعارات

خصائص و مميزات تطبيق الأذكار و الأدعية "أذكاري":

* أذكار الصباح, أذكار المساء أذكار النوم و غيرها من أذكار اليوم و اليلة
* تنبيه لأوقات أذكار الصباح, أذكار المساء, أذكار النوم
* رسائل اذكاري لتلقي اذكار و أدعية جديدة
* بوصلة القبلة, تعمل بدون انترنت
* صفحة بماذا تشعر؟ الاذكار مصنفة حسب الشعور
* المسبحة الاكترونية الذكية!
* ظهور الاذكار و الأدعية على مركز الاشعارات, ليساعدك ان لا تنسى ذكرك الله ابدا
* بامكانك اضافة اذكارك او ادعيتك الخاصة بك، لتظهر بشكل تلقائي على مركز الاشعارات
* استهلاك "أذكاري" للبطارية شيء لا يذكر. فقد تم تحسين ادائه و تجريبه ليقدم لك باحسن ادائه.
* يمكنك تصميم اشعار الذكر بنفسك فيمكنك تغيير لون خلفية اشعار الذكر, حجم و شكل خط الذكر..والمزيد..
* والمزيد من الميزات الرائعة التي تنتظرك لتكتشفها في برنامج أذكاري...

انشروه لينالكم الاجر

English:
"Athkari" Muslims's application, It has been designed to help you to never forget to mention Allah in the simplest way. Everything thing will be customizable in order to help you never forget to mention Allah on the way suitable for you.
 
While you are browsing Internet, news, chating or whatever you are doing on your mobile, Azkari will be able show the notification smoothly to remind you with Allah's name (Athkar) on your personally customized way..

Please share Azkari app as much as you can let Muslims share the Thawab..

Features of Azkari for Muslims:
* Morning Athkar, Evening Zikir, and Sleep Athkar
* Notification for Sabah Athkar, Evening Athkar, and Sleep Zikirs
* Qibla Compass, Works offline
* Athkar will be changed automatically, and periodically to remind you to mention Allah, just by draging the notification center down.
* You can add Athkar that you want it to show up in the notification
* Material Design is used to help you get what you want as fast as possible.
* FREE
* keep your Athkari up to date

Discover the power of language with Translate AI – your trusted companion for breaking language barriers while traveling, working, or learning.
Powered by advanced artificial intelligence, Translate AI delivers fast, accurate, and natural translations for text, voice, and images.

Exceptional Features for Global Communication

Text Translation
Instantly translate written words into multiple languages with high accuracy.
Whether you're a traveler trying to understand signs, a student learning a new language, or a professional communicating internationally, Translate AI is your reliable translation tool.

Voice Translation
Enjoy real-time, natural conversations without interruptions.
Perfect for international meetings, travel, or casual chats with people around the world.

Image Translation
Simply point your camera at signs, menus, or documents to get instant and precise translations directly on your screen.

Keyboard Translation
Seamlessly integrate translation into your daily typing.
Type in one language and get an instant translation in another — ideal for messages, chats, and emails.

Why Choose Translate AI

Multimodal Translation
Text, voice, or image — Translate AI adapts to any translation need.
Unmatched Accuracy
Our state-of-the-art AI understands context to provide natural, meaningful translations — not just word-for-word results.

Elegant and Easy-to-Use Design
A clean, modern interface makes switching between languages and translation modes effortless.

Continuous Updates
We’re constantly improving, adding new features and expanding our language database to give you the most comprehensive translation experience possible.
Translate AI is more than just an app — it’s a bridge that connects you to the world.

Download now and experience smart translation today!

Supported Languages
Enjoy translations across a wide range of languages, including Afrikaans, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, and many more.

Most authentic Quran app since 2010.

Recognized by more than 65 million Muslim users around the world.

تطبيق القرآن الأكثر اعتمادا منذ عام ٢٠١٠.

معترف به من قبل أكثر من ٦٥ مليون مستخدم حول العالم.

Quran Majeed is an amazing Quran app that beautifies your life with the blessing of reading and listening to the Quran on the go. The latest version of the authentic Quran Majeed app for iPhone and iPad offers complete Quran in the elegant Uthmanic script, audio recitation, translations and English Tafsir Uthmani, proofread by a Muslim scholar ('alim).
القرآن المجيد هو تطبيق مميز للقرآن الذي يجمل حياتك ببركة القراءة والاستماع إلى القرآن أثناء التنقل. الإصدار الأخير من تطبيق القرآن المجيد لأجهزة الآي فون والآيباد تقدم قرآنًا كاملاً في الكتابة العثمانية الأنيقة، وتلاوة الصوت، والترجمات، والتفاسير، وقام بمراجعته أحد العلماء

● Worldwide Prayer Times clock with Azan/Adhan alarm options. Supports different prayer time calculation methods. Qibla direction. Ramadan Sehar/Iftar times
أوقات الصلاة لجميع أنحاء العالم مع خيار تنبيه الأذان، ودعم طرق مختلفة لحساب أوقات الصلاة، وبوصلة القبلة، وأوقات السحور والإفطار

تطبيق القرآن هو مجموعة من أفضل قراء القرآن في العالم. تصميم مبسط ومريح واجهة المستخدم مع مجموعة متنوعة من الميزات الجديدة.
 
تطبيق القرآن هو مجاني

مع تطبيق القرآن الكريم يمكنك:
 
+ قراءة القرآن باللغة العربية مع ترجمتها (الإنجليزية أو الفرنسية أو تفسير المعنى مع تفسير الجلالين)
+ حفظ السور المفضلة لديك وكذا الفراء
+ تحميل تلاوة السور والاستماع متواجد حاليا
+ تحميل كل أو السورة
+ تحميل تلاوات أكثر من 23 قارئ
+ إرسال للعائلة والأصدقاء
+  أدعية قرآنية
+ تشغيل الصوت في الخلفية أثناء استخدام جهاز اي فون / آي باد
+ توطيد: الآن أسرع وأبسط وأكثر حيوية  واجهة المستخدم ذات هندسة رائعة .
+ الآن يمكن تشغيل التطبيق على اي فون / آي باد ريتينا
 
متطلبات
- يتطلب التطبيق اتصال بالإنترنت مع واي فاي WiFi أو الجيل الثالث 3G للاستخدام في حال كنت لم يتم تحميل السور.
 
 
لديك تعليقات أو أسئلة؟ يرجى الاتصال بنا مباشرة
 
لا تنسون من صالح الدعاء
 
 نسأل الله تعالى أن يمنحنا الإخلاص في النية والرحمة وتوحيد جميع المسلمين تحت راية النبي محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم، وأن نكون من بين الفائزين يوم القيامة.

قم بتنزيل القرآن الكريم اليوم واستمتع بالاستماع إلى أفضل القراء في العالم.

description:
Break Language Barriers Instantly with AI Translator – Your Live, Real-Time Translation Companion


Speak, scan, and translate now—anytime, anywhere—with Translate AI, the ultimate AI translator for everyday communication, travel, business, and learning. Whether you’re navigating a new country, chatting with friends abroad, or closing international deals, this powerful live translator is designed to help you understand and be understood.
With cutting-edge AI for translation, Translate AI offers real-time voice and audio translator tools, camera-based AI image translation, text translation, and an offline phrasebook—all in one sleek app. Say goodbye to confusion and hello to seamless, global conversations.

Key Features:

Real-Time Voice & Audio Translator
Experience fluent, two-way communication with our live voice translator. Speak naturally and get instant results with our AI auto translate engine. Perfect for business, travel, and everyday use.

AI Camera & Photo Translator

Point your camera at any text—menus, signs, labels—and Translate AI will detect and translate it instantly. Use our AI image translation technology to see the world through your language.

AI Text Translator

Type or paste text to receive fast, accurate translations. From single words to full sentences, our ai translator engine ensures clarity every time.
Translate Audio with Ease
The built-in audio translator makes spoken communication fast and fluid. Great for meetings, voice memos, or casual conversation.
Supports Over 100 Languages
From English, Spanish, and French to Chinese, Japanese, Turkish, and more, Translate AI gives you access to over 100 supported languages.
Offline Phrasebook
 Save key phrases and access them even without the internet. Your must-have tool for travelers and emergencies.
Smarter Translations, Thanks to AI
 Our app uses advanced AI quick translate technology that adapts to your tone and context. It’s like having an intelligent interpreter in your pocket.

Why Choose Translate AI?

Fast and intuitive ai translator for speech, text, and images
All-in-one live translator with voice, camera, and typing options
Translate now with zero delays or complications
Ideal ai chat translator for everyday conversations and social apps
Innovative auto translator that learns your language patterns
Seamless UI designed for fast access and efficiency


Use Cases:

Travel: Navigate new places with confidence. Use your live translator to understand signs, menus, or directions instantly.

Business: Make global communication effortless in meetings and negotiations with your reliable ai translator.

Learning: Boost your language learning with ai quick translate tools and real-life examples.
Daily Communication: Use the ai chat translator for texting, social media, or online content in any language.

On-the-Go: Rely on the camera and image translator to understand foreign packaging, documents, or signage.
Whether you’re learning a new language, traveling the globe, or connecting across cultures, Translate AI is the smartest way to speak fluently and confidently. With our built-in AI for translation, you can say what you mean and understand what others say—without delay.

Break the language barrier. Speak freely. Translate now.
Download AI Translator - Translate AI today and explore the world with confidence.

Daily Supplications enables you to read and listen to more than 300 different islamic duaas everyday. It also features prayer times, Hijri date, qibla and custom reminders to give you the right supplication at the right time.


Main features:

• Duaas and Hadiths to read everyday with counters to help you keep track of what you've read (click on the counter each time you read a supplication. The app will save the number of times you've read a supplication and reset the counters  at midnight).
• Supplications to read on special occasions.
• Salat times with auto calculation depending on your location (you can choose your city manually or by GPS).
• Step by step Prayer tutorial.
• Quran.
• Qibla.
• Tasbih.
• 99 Names of Allah.
• Tracker.
• Reminder for fasting supplications when Maghrib prayer in Ramadhan.
• The app can help you read and finish the Quran during Ramadhan.
• Supplications' audio. The audio can be downloaded and cached for offline playback (read a supplication the first time with internet, so that it is cached for offline playback later).
• Translation, Transliteration & References for all the supplications.
• Translation & Transliteration for the Quran (can be enabled from the settings).
• Widget for daily supplications.
• The possibility to mark supplications as favorite so you can find them easily.
• A search functionality to easily find the right supplication in no time.
• Alarms to remind you of your daily supplications (these alarms can be deactivated from the settings).
• Custom reminders to help you do your important tasks (read sourat AlKahf every Friday or fast on Mondays and Thursdays for example) or to remind you of a certain supplication at a certain time.
• Notifications at Salat times with the possibility to choose from different athans.
• Islamic Calendar (Hijri Date) with the different Islamic events.

The App, the Quran, the adhkars and duaas are entirely translated to English, French, German, Portuguese, Spanish, Indonesian, Turkish, Italian and Arabic.

Follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/dailyislamicduaas

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

يقدم لكم بيت التمويل الكويتي أحدث البرامج التي تم تطويرها لخدمة المستخدم المسلم بالإستفادة من التقنيات الحديثة المتوفرة. برنامج القرآن الكريم برنامج متخصص بعرض القرآن الكريم وإستماعة بصورة تفاعلية ميسرة. يوظف البرنامج البيئة الجديدة على هواتف الآي فون مما يتيح للمستخدم التفاعل مع القرآن الكريم بسهولة ويسر مع الإحتفاظ بجماليات المصحف الشريف من خطوط بالرسم العثماني ونقوش دلائل الآيات والسور.

من اهم مميزات البرنامج:

1.التفاعل مع نص القرآن بالخط العثماني على مستوى الآية مما يتيح للمستخدم التفاعل مع آيات المصحف بدلا عن صفحاته.
2.إدراج نظام مميز لحفظ مواقع القراءة بحيث يتمكن القارئي من تحديد الآية وحفظها لرجوع لها. كما يتيح البرنامج للمستخدم عدد غير محدود من الفواصل يسمح له بمتابعة الختمات والقراءات بصورة ميسرة وجميلة.
3.يعرض البرنامج خلفية الصفحات بألوان متعددة تتيح للقارئ إختيار اللون المريح بالنسبة له. كما يتيح البرنامج للقارئ القراءة الليلية والتي تلون الخلفية باللون الأسود والخطوط البيضاء لتعطي القارئ الراحة التامة عند القراءة في أجواء منخفضة الإضائة.
4.ييسر البرنامج خاصية البحث النصي في آيات القرآن من خلال البحث اللحظي وعرض النتائج مع الصفحات بالإضافة إلى إمكانية الذهاب للصفحة وتظليل خلفية الآية المختارة ليسهل على المستخدم معرفتها.
كما يوفر البرنامج العديد من المميزات الأخرى التي تساعد على القراءة السهلة والميسرة.
5. دعم الشاشات الكبيرة لأجهزة الآيباد بإمكانية عرض أكثر من صفحة على الشاشة مع المحافظة على ميزة عرض الصفحة بصورة كبيرة تملأ الشاشة بالعرض.
6. عرض التفاسير المختلفة بصورة تتيح للقارئ التصفح السهل والتنقل بين الآيات.
7. الإستماع لأشهر القراء بصورة تفاعلية تربط ما بين الآيات على صفحات المصحفة والتلاوة المسموعة

Millions of Muslims around the world use Muslim Assistant app to see prayer times and find Qibla direction.

Muslim Assistant, the most downloaded prayer time application in all Muslim countries, includes many useful features.

MUSLIM ASSISTANT FEATURES

Prayer Times: The application shows you the most accurate azan times according to your location or region. If you want, you can receive prayer time notifications with Azan sound or with other sound options.

Qibla Finder: You can find Mecca and Kaaba on the map, and you can determine the Kaaba direction of your location in the most accurate way. With the help of Compass Mode, It is easy to see where the Kaaba is located even when you are offline, and you can pray according to Islamic rules.

Dhikr Counter: You can easily make dhikrs, record your dhikr counts and dhikr loops.

Friday Messages: You can send special Friday messages to your loved ones.

Nearby Mosques: You can see the Mosques and Masjids closest to your location on the map.

The Quran: You can read the Quran in 40+ different languages and there are also transliteration options. You can see the Juz list and change the text size as well. You have the option to listen to the Quran recited by famous reciters, providing a unique and diverse listening experience.

Kaaba Live Broadcast: You can watch the Kaaba live 24 hours a day.

Esma-ul Husna: You can see the 99 names of Allah and their meanings and listen to Esma hymn and make dhikr of each Name.

Hijri Calendar: You can follow the dates of important islamic days such as Ramadan, Laylat-ul Qadr, Eid al-Fitr and Eid al-Adha.

Message Editor: You can choose existing messages or compose new ones, with a variety of background options, using the editor tool and send your custom messages to your loved ones.

Notes:

For proper Qibla Finder usage, you need to hold your phone on a flat surface and keep it away from electromagnetic fields and metal objects. If it is necessary, you can manually rearrange your location through pressing the marker.

Because the app uses your device's location settings to give you prayer times, please kindly be aware your location settings are open and up to date.

May Allah bless us all.

Translate and learn millions of words and expressions and express yourself as if you were a native speaker.

Reverso is the best tool for those who seek quality translation, looking to master a foreign language: reading, writing or speaking, and it's free.

Students, teachers, business professionals or others, whether beginners or advanced, use Reverso to learn new words or expressions, and eliminate the risk of being mistaken.

It provides you instant translations of the selected text when reading content on your browser, on Safari or any other app.
 
Reverso Context is based on data gathered from millions of real-life texts (official documents, movie subtitles, product descriptions) in both languages. These texts are processed with powerful "big data" algorithms and machine learning to provide you the best results. 

What do we mean by context? The search results (translation) of a specific word or expression are weaved within real-life sentences, so you will be sure to understand and learn exactly how the word can be used, and make no embarrassing mistakes.  

Just type or say the word or expression you wish to translate and the results will appear instantly:  relevant translations, presented with examples of how words are used in sentences.

The app offers flashcards and quizzes based on your search history and favorites to help you memorize them and to improve your language skills. Unlike standard learning tools, it focuses on words and expressions that you really need and want to learn.

The bits and bytes: 
* Instantly translate selected text when reading content on your browser, iBook or any other app, with no need to exit the app you are using. Click on the familiar "Share" option and select the Reverso option. 
* Translation in 17 languages: Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Dutch, Arabic, Russian, Romanian, Japanese, Turkish, Hebrew and Chinese, Korean, Swedish, Ukrainian and we are working on more.
* Advanced features include pronunciation, history, phrasebook of your favorites and more.
* Create vocabulary lists based on your personal selection of examples and translations. Lists remain available even when you’re offline. 
* Enjoy natural pronunciation of complete example sentences.
* One click to get translations, frequency details, and  conjugation when applicable.
* Search history, also available offline.
* Suggestions: words and expressions will be suggested to you as you type.
* Share your findings via email or social media.
